A WebSocket subscription which broadcasts all changes happening to Protect-managed hardware devices

schema.description: A device which was created, updated or deleted

get.description: A WebSocket subscription that broadcasts Protect events

schema.description: An event that was created or updated

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: The slot number (0-4) of the patrol that is currently running, or null if no patrol is running

204.description: The camera PTZ patrol was started successfully.
The camera PTZ patrol was stopped successfully.

post.description: Adjust the PTZ camera position to a specified preset

parameters.name: slot
parameters.description: The slot number (0-4) of the preset to move the camera to

schema.description: The slot number (0-4) of the preset to move the camera to

204.description: The PTZ camera was moved to the given preset successfully.

post.summary: Send a webhook to the alarm manager
post.description: Send a webhook to the alarm manager to trigger configured alarms

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User defined string used to trigger only specific alarms. Alarm should be configured with the same ID to be triggered.

204.description: Webhook was sent to alarm manager successfully

lcdMessage.description: Message that's set on the LCD screen (for doorbells and/or other devices with LCD screens). To upload image assets for the LCD screen, use the `/files/{fileType}` endpoint.

x-enum-descriptions: Recommended, the system automatically adjusts the HDR level.
Forces HDR to be always enabled as the highest level.

cause.description: An optional nested cause for the parent error

viewerModelKey.description: The model key of the viewer
viewerModelKey.title: viewerModelKey

mac.description: The MAC address of the device
mac.title: mac

streamLimit.description: Count of maximum supported parallel live streams.
streamLimit.title: streamLimit

name.description: The name of this live view.

isDefault.description: Whether this live view is the default one for all viewers.

isGlobal.description: Whether this live view is global and available system-wide to all users

layout.description: The number of slots this live view contains. Which as a consequence also affects the layout of the live view.

cycleMode.description: Whether to switch to next camera in slot based on motion events or a strict time interval

cycleInterval.description: How long should each camera stream be shown for in seconds until we cycle to the next camera

items.description: Which cameras will be visible in a given slot and how will they be cycled through

slots.description: List of cameras visible in each given slot. And cycling settings for each slot if it has multiple cameras listed.

liveviewModelKey.description: The model key of the liveview
liveviewModelKey.title: liveviewModelKey

osdOverlayLocation.title: osdOverlayLocation

supportFullHdSnapshot.description: Whether camera support full HD or higher resolution snapshot

smartDetectTypes.description: What smart detection object types do the camera support.

cameraId.description: Which paired (doorbell-only) camera do these settings refer to.

repeatTimes.description: How many times should the ringtone be repeated

ringtoneId.description: The ID of the ringtone that should be played when the (doorbell-only) camera is rung.

volume.description: How loud should the ringtone be played. 0 being silent and 100 the loudest.

camera.description: Which camera is configured to be paired to this light.

lightModelKey.description: The model key of the light
lightModelKey.title: lightModelKey

lightModeSettings.description: Settings for when and how your light gets activated

enableAt.description: At what time is the lighting mode relevant and acted upon (this has no effect when mode is off).
enableAt.title: enableAt

isIndicatorEnabled.description: Turn on/off floodlight status LED indicator.

pirDuration.description: How long the light stays on after a motion event in milliseconds.

pirSensitivity.description: How sensitive is the PIR to motion (0-100)%.

ledLevel.description: Brightness level of the main LED (1-6).

isDark.description: Whether the light is currently sensing that it's in a dark scene.
isDark.title: isDark

isLightOn.description: Whether the light has its main LED currently enabled.
isLightOn.title: isLightOn

isLightForceEnabled.description: Whether the light has its main LED currently force-enabled.

lastMotion.description: Unix timestamp of the last time the PIR motion-detection was triggered.

sensorValue.description: Decimal value of the metric measured by the sensor

sensorStatus.title: sensorStatus

margin.description: Ambient light threshold detection hysteresis margin (Lux). Read-only value decided by sensor implementation.

lowThreshold.description: Ambient light interrupt threshold low level from 1 to 503192 (Lux).

highThreshold.description: Ambient light interrupt threshold high level from 1 to 503192 (Lux).

margin.description: Humidity threshold detection hysteresis margin (%). Read-only value decided by sensor implementation.

lowThreshold.description: Humidity low level threshold from 1 to 99 (%).

highThreshold.description: Humidity high level threshold from 1 to 99 (%).

margin.description: Temperature threshold detection hysteresis margin (C). Read-only value decided by sensor implementation.

lowThreshold.description: Temperature low level threshold from -39 to 124 (C).

highThreshold.description: Temperature high level threshold from -39 to 124 (C).
